import React from "react" import "./style.css" import LoadingOverlay from "react-loading-overlay" import PaperPlane from "../../svg/paperplane.svg" const CenterForm = ({ threads, selectedThread, formData, handleChangeForm, sendForm, command, handleChange, showTextField, textFieldValue, setTextFieldValue, sendCommands, deleteGeneration, regenerateGeneration, delilahWorking, }) => { const isFormSubmitted = threads.find((thread) => thread.id === selectedThread)?.generations .length > 0 const handleChangeTextField = (e) => { setTextFieldValue(e.target.value) } const sendFormComponent = () => { return (
{ e.preventDefault() sendForm() }} >
{formData.prompt_choices.map((promptChoice, index) => (
handleChangeForm(e, index)} placeholder={promptChoice.choice_type} />
))}
) } const sendCommandsComponent = () => { return (
{/* tailwind, add red font and a light red background */}
{showTextField && (
)}
) } return (
{!isFormSubmitted ? sendFormComponent() : sendCommandsComponent()}
) } export default CenterForm
